00032 class BaseNode : public QObject {
00033   Q_OBJECT
00034   Q_PROPERTY(int posX READ posX WRITE setPosX)
00035   Q_PROPERTY(int posY READ posY WRITE setPosY)
00036 
00037   public:
00038     enum DiagramType {
00039       Class,
00040       Interaction,
00041       UseCase,
00042       StateChart,
00043       Collaboration,
00044       Nothing
00045     };
00046 
00047     BaseNode();
00048     // ~BaseNode() {}
00049 
00050     QDomElement to_xml(QDomDocument &doc, QDomElement &doc_root);
00051     void from_xml(QDomElement &element);
00052 
00053     void setSelected(bool newState) { selected = newState; }
00054     void setPosition(const QPoint &pos) {
00055       position = pos;
00056       setUpConnectionPoints();
00057     }
00058     void setPosX(int x) { position.setX(x); }
00059     void setPosY(int y) { position.setY(y); }
00060     void setId(QUuid id) { m_id = id; }
00061     int posX() { return position.x(); }
00062     int posY() { return position.y(); }
00063     QUuid Id() { return m_id; }
00064     QPoint getPosition() { return position; }
00065 
00066     virtual void draw(QPainter &painter) = 0;  // NOLINT
00067     virtual BaseNode* clone() = 0;
00068     virtual QDialog* getDialog() = 0;
00069     virtual QString getIconPath() = 0;
00070     virtual QString getText() = 0;
00071     virtual bool hitTest(const QPoint &point) = 0;
00072     virtual bool isConnector() = 0;
00073     virtual DiagramType getDiagramType() = 0;
00074 
00075     void addConnnectionPoint(const QPoint &newpoint);
00076     void addConnectedNode(BaseNode *newObject);
00077     void removeConnectedNode(BaseNode *object);
00078     QPoint getClosestConnectionPoint(const QPoint& point);
00079     std::list<BaseNode*> getConnectedNodes();
00080 
00081     void setSelectedForConnectionPoint(bool state) { cpSelected = state; }
00082     QPoint returnConnectionPoint(int value);
00083 
00084     int stringLength(const QString &string);
00085     int stringHeight(const QString &string);
00086 
00087   private:
00088     std::vector<QPoint> connectionPoints;
00089 
00090   protected:
00091     virtual void setUpConnectionPoints();
00092 
00093     // whether the object is selected or not
00094     bool selected;
00095     // whether the object is selected for creating a connection or not
00096     bool cpSelected;
00097     // the center of the object (not relevant for connections)
00098     QPoint position;
00099     // The length (i.e. width) of the bounding box for this object
00100     int length;
00101     // The height of the bounding box for this object
00102     int height;
00103     // A linked list of pointers to the connected objects
00104     std::list<BaseNode*> connectedObjects;
00105     // The unique id for this node
00106     QUuid m_id;
00107 };
